Class Player

extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Details

    • hit

      public void hit​(int i)
      Performs hit action.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the hand.

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(int i, Card card)
      Adds a card t the hand.
      Parameters:
      i - Hand's index.
      card - Regular card.

    • getNHands

      public int getNHands()
      Gets number of hands.
      Returns:
      nHands Number of hands.

    • stand

      public void stand​(int i)
      Performs the stand action.
      Parameters:
      i - Hand's index.

    • surrender

      public void surrender​(int i)
      Performs the surrender action.
      Parameters:
      i - Hand's index

    • insurance

      public void insurance()
      Performs the insurance action

    • isInsuring

      public boolean isInsuring()
      Checks if the player decided to insure.
      Returns:
      isInsuring Flag which evaluates the decision to ensure.

    • split

      public void split​(int i)
      Performs the split action.

      Increments the number of hands, removes the previous hand and adds two new ones, with one card each (only the splitted cards)

      Parameters:
      i - Index of the card.

    • doubleD

      public void doubleD​(int i)
      Peforms the double down action. Also sets isHitting to true since the player can only take one more card in this hand.
      Parameters:
      i - Index of the hand.

    • placeBet

      public void placeBet​(int newBet)
      Places a nwe value for the bet. Deduces it's value from the player's balance
      Parameters:
      newBet - New value for the bet.

    • clearHands

      public void clearHands()
      Removes all hands and adds a new empty one

    • getBalance

      public float getBalance()
      Gets the current value for the balance.
      Returns:
      balance Current value of money possessed by the player.

    • updateBalance

      public void updateBalance​(float update)
      Updates the balance value
      Parameters:
      update - Change in balance

    • printPlayersHand

      public void printPlayersHand​(int i)
      Displays the player's hand

      If i is -1 then the player only has one Hand and so the affix with the hand number won't show up

      Parameters:
      i - Hand index

    • isHittingHand

      public boolean isHittingHand​(int i)
      Checks if the player decided to hit on hand i
      Parameters:
      i - Hand index
      Returns:
      Decision to hit

    • isStandingHand

      public boolean isStandingHand​(int i)
      Checks if the player decided to stand
      Parameters:
      i - Hand index
      Returns:
      Decision to stand

    • isSurrendingHand

      public boolean isSurrendingHand​(int i)
      Checks if the player decided to surrender
      Parameters:
      i - Hand index
      Returns:
      Decision to surrender

    • isSplitting

      public boolean isSplitting()
      Checks for a split.
      Returns:
      isSplitting Result of the decision to split.

    • getBet

      public int getBet()
      Gets value of the bet
      Returns:
      bet Value of the bet

    • setIsSplitting

      public void setIsSplitting​(boolean b)
      Sets the decision to split
      Parameters:
      b - Decision to split

    • isDoubleDHand

      public boolean isDoubleDHand​(int i)
      Checks for a double down
      Parameters:
      i - Card's index
      Returns:
      hands.get(i).isDouble Decision to surrender
